attributes.action: ensure all new housing communities are 100% clean energy ,self sufficent in food with shared alotmonts, with pleanty of green open spaces with plenty of woodland,parkland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we need new green communities with solar panels fitted to roofs, small wind turbines ,well insulated and energy efficient housing.

with each community sharing an alotmont
so they can be self sufficent for food

with plenty of green spaces i,e woodland , grassland , parkland 

resycling majority of waste by iproving the service giing each family several containers one for glass, one for paper and cardboard and so on, 

we need to change they way were living for the good of everyone improving our lives all of the above and more will do so, we need the goverment to take the lead in making our communities cleaner, more enjoyable places to live
